full_threads.body: (Time: 15mins)

Hi Jen,

Thanks for sending the inventory list.

We have updated the list and drafted the other inventory.

Hi

Thanks for sending the inventory list.

I've added some notes in red to delete from the platform please.

Warm Regards,

Jen Lovegrove
ASSISTANT TO SENIOR STYLISTS

jlovegrove@novaricollective.com

02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019

novaricollective.com.au
(Time: 15mins)

Hi Jen,

Sure, confirming we have added 4 predefined rooms.

Could you please create 4 more predefined rooms?

DINING (2 seater) - includes table (2 seater), 2 dining chairs, 1 accessories (dining)

DINING (4 seater) - includes table (4 seater), 4 dining chairs, 1 accessories (dining

DINING (6 seater) - includes table (6 seater), 6 dining chairs, 1 accessories (dining

DINING (8 seater) - includes table (8 seater), 8 dining chairs, 1 accessories (dining

Warm Regards,

Jen Lovegrove
ASSISTANT TO SENIOR STYLISTS

jlovegrove@novaricollective.com

02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019

novaricollective.com.au

Hi Jen,

We just want to confirm, would you like us to create inventory: 2 Dining Chair, 4 Dining Chair, 6 Dining Chair, 8 Dining Chair?

Thank you for explaining. I will send all these lists to our team to review.

In the meantime, could you please make a change on the platform for dining chairs? We are constantly getting quotes approved where its a 2/4/6/8 seater table and only 1 dining chair, are you able to autogenerate the number of dining chairs to match the table?

Warm Regards,

Jen Lovegrove
ASSISTANT TO SENIOR STYLISTS

jlovegrove@novaricollective.com

02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019

novaricollective.com.au

Hi Jen,

Sure, this was setup previously ( around 3-4 years ago).

If you change the Range Column it will grab its pricing if empty it default to 0.
Price P
Price E
Price O

But I think the pricing now is Based on Price P only. Price E and Price O, I think it is safe to diregard the Price E and Price O column

Thank you very much.

Could you please explain what these three price columns mean?

Warm Regards,

Jen Lovegrove
ASSISTANT TO SENIOR STYLISTS

jlovegrove@novaricollective.com

02 9310 1611 | Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street Banksmeadow NSW 2019

novaricollective.com.au
(Time: 60mins)

Hi Jen,

Got it, We exported the file. please see the attached file.

Thanks, however I am able to generate these lists myself on the platform.

We need the pricing included as well, similar to the excel file you sent for the other items. Some of the items in the templates are incorrectly priced and incorrectly named so I need to see what the items are in the back end.

Warm Regards,

Jen Lovegrove
ASSISTANT TO SENIOR STYLISTS
